changeSet.sql: Update SecRoles Set RoleDesc = 'Menu Role', RoleCategory = 'MENU' Where RoleCD in (Select RoleCode From MENU_RIGHT_ROLE_GROUPS); Update SecGroups Set GrpDesc = 'Menu Groups' Where GrpCode in (Select GroupCode From MENU_RIGHT_ROLE_GROUPS);

changeSet.author: murthy.y
changeSet.sql: Delete From SecGroupRights Where RightID in (Select RightID from SecRights Where RightType = 0 and RightName not in (Select RightName from MENU_RIGHT_ROLE_GROUPS));
